Verses: 1 seeyonile Ekkaalam Oodhungal, En Parisuththa Parvadhaththile Echcharippin Saththamidungal; Dhesaththinkudigal Ellaam Thaththalikkakkadavargal; Enenilkarththarudaiya Naal Varugiradhu, Adhu Sameebamaayirukkiradhu.

2 adhu Irulum Andhagaaramumaana Naal; Adhu Mappum Mandhaaramumaana Naal; Vidiyarkaala Veluppu Parvadhangalinmel Paravugiradhupola Eraalamaana Balaththa Oru Jaadhi Theeviramaaga Vandhu Paravum; Appadippattadhu Munnoru Kaalaththilum Undaanadhumillai, Iniththalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Varum Varushangalilum Undaavadhumillai.

3 avaigalukku Munnaaga Akkini Patchikkum, Avaigalukkup Pinnaaga Juvaalai Erikkum; Avaigalukku Munnaaga Dhesam Edhen Thottaththaippolavum, Avaigalukkup Pinnaagap Paazhaana Vanaandharaththaippolavum Irukkum; Avaigalukku Ondrum Thappippovadhillai.
4 avaigalin Saayal Kudhiraigalin Saayalai Oththadhu; Avaigal Kudhirai Veeraraippola Odum.
5 avaigal Odugira Radhangalin Iraichchalpolavum, Seththaigalai Erikkira Akkinijuvaalaiyin Iraichchalpolavum, Yuththaththukku Aayaththappatta Balatht
